mapper.insert: insert into BOARD (BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_REG_DAY, MEMBER_SEQ, QUESTION_SEQ)values (B_SEQ.nextval, #{bTitle}, #{bContent}, SYSDATE, (select MEMBER_SEQ from MEMBER where MEMBER_SEQ = #{mSeq}), (select QUESTION_SEQ from QUESTION where QUESTION_SEQ= #{qSeq}))
mapper.delete: delete from BOARD where BOARD_SEQ = #{bSeq} and MEMBER_SEQ = #{mSeq}
mapper.select: select B.BOARD_SEQ, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_REG_DAY, B.BOARD_LIKE, B.BOARD_COUNT, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME from MEMBER M join BOARD B on M.MEMBER_SEQ = B.MEMBER_SEQ where TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_REG_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{bRegday} ORDER BY B.BOARD_SEQ

select B.BOARD_SEQ, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_REG_DAY, B.BOARD_LIKE, B.BOARD_COUNT, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME from MEMBER M join BOARD B on M.MEMBER_SEQ = B.MEMBER_SEQ where B.MEMBER_SEQ = #{mSeq} order by B.BOARD_SEQ

select B.BOARD_SEQ, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_REG_DAY, B.BOARD_LIKE, B.BOARD_COUNT, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_CONTENT from MEMBER M join BOARD B on M.MEMBER_SEQ = B.MEMBER_SEQ where B.BOARD_SEQ = #{bSeq}
mapper.update: update BOARD set BOARD_COUNT = BOARD_COUNT+1 where BOARD_SEQ = #{bSeq} and MEMBER_SEQ = #{mSeq}
